```{r}
#| label: pkg_load_postgresql
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| eval: false
use("DBI", "dbConnect")
use("RPostgres", "Postgres")
use("fs", "dir_create")
```

```{r}
#| label: postgresql_example
#| eval: false
in_dir <- system.file("extdata/oa", package = "tidywigits")
out_dir <- tempdir() |> fs::dir_create("parquet_example")
oa <- Oncoanalyser$new(in_dir)
dbconn <- DBI::dbConnect(
  drv = RPostgres::Postgres(),
  dbname = "nemo",
  user = "orcabus"
)
res <- oa$nemofy(
  format = "db",
  id = "db_example",
  dbconn = dbconn
)
```
